css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-1aef59b2-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:calc(50% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(50% - 1.25%);min-width:initial;justify-content:flex-end;flex-direction:row;-moz-column-gap:10%;column-gap:10%;}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-1aef59b2-u{width:100%;flex-basis:100%;justify-content:flex-start;-moz-column-gap:30px;column-gap:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-1aef59b2-u{justify-content:center;}}
